data.trans: Khăng khăng, nhất định đòi hỏi thứ gì
data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi nhất định đòi hỏi các tiêu chuẩn cao nhất về sự sạch sẽ trong dây chuyền sản xuất.
data.en_hint: We insist on the highest standards of cleanliness in the production line.
data.content_game_1: We insist on the highest standards of cleanliness in the production line.
data.answer_en_hint: We insist on the highest standards of cleanliness in the production line.

data.trans: (+ doing st/adj) Kết thúc, nhận lãnh cái gì đó
data.trans_hint: Sao họ lại kết thúc bằng sự chia tay vậy chứ?
data.en_hint: How did they end up breaking up like that?
data.content_game_1: How did they end up breaking up like that?
data.answer_en_hint: How did they end up breaking up like that?

data.trans: Chuyển sang một điều gì đó mới
data.trans_hint: Cô ấy vẫn chưa sẵn sàng chuyển sang một mối quan hệ mới.
data.en_hint: She is not ready to move on to a new relationship.
data.content_game_1: She is not ready to move on to a new relationship.
data.answer_en_hint: She is not ready to move on to a new relationship.

data.trans: Hẹn hò, yêu đương với ai
data.trans_hint: Em có muốn hẹn hò với tôi tối nay không?
data.en_hint: Do you want to go out with me tonight?
data.content_game_1: Do you want to go out with me tonight?
data.answer_en_hint: Do you want to go out with me tonight?

data.trans_hint: Sau một tháng làm quen với mọi người trong lớp, Karen đã cảm thấy thoải mái hơn khi bắt chuyện với các bạn khác.
data.en_hint: After 1 month of getting to know people in the class, Karen felt more at ease to start a conversation with others.
data.content_game_1: After 1 month of getting to know people in the class, Karen felt more at ease to start a conversation with others.
data.answer_en_hint: After 1 month of getting to know people in the class, Karen felt more at ease to start a conversation with others.

data.trans: Không phí công vô ích (trong một mối quan hệ)
data.trans_hint: Nếu cô ấy thực sự không thích cậu, câu không nên phí công vô ích nữa và hãy tìm một người khác tốt hơn.
data.en_hint: If she doesn't really like you, you should cut your losses and find another better one.
data.content_game_1: If she doesn't really like you, you should cut your losses and find another better one.
data.answer_en_hint: If she doesn't really like you, you should cut your losses and find another better one.

data.trans: Hòa hợp với (ai hoặc cái gì)
data.trans_hint: Tôi thừa nhận mình sai khi đã nghĩ rằng Mary không thể thân với ai trong số các cậu. Thức tế cậu ấy rất hòa hợp với nhóm chúng mình.
data.en_hint: I stood corrected when I thought Mary couldn't get along with any of you. In fact, she fits in with our group really well.
data.content_game_1: I stood corrected when I thought Mary couldn't get along with any of you. In fact, she fits in with our group really well.
data.answer_en_hint: I stood corrected when I thought Mary couldn't get along with any of you. In fact, she fits in with our group really well.

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy không chắc liệu mình có tỏ tình thành công với Ben hay không nhưng cô ấy sẽ thử.
data.en_hint: She's not sure if she can confess her love to Ben successfully, but she'll give it a try.
data.content_game_1: She's not sure if she can confess her love to Ben successfully, but she'll give it a try.
data.answer_en_hint: She's not sure if she can confess her love to Ben successfully, but she'll give it a try.

data.trans_hint: Tôi có linh cảm rằng sau buổi sự kiện tối nay Lee và John có thể còn tiến triển trên mức tình bạn.
data.en_hint: I have a gut feeling that Lee and John may become more than friends after tonight's event.
data.content_game_1: I have a gut feeling that Lee and John may become more than friends after tonight's event.
data.answer_en_hint: I have a gut feeling that Lee and John may become more than friends after tonight's event.

data.trans: Gặp gỡ ai (sau khi đã lên lịch)
data.trans_hint: Christina quyết định sẽ gặp gỡ gã đàn ông mới quen chỉ sau đúng 1 tuần hèn hò nhau trên Facebook.
data.en_hint: Christina decided to meet up with her newly met guy after 1 week of dating each other on Facebook.
data.content_game_1: Christina decided to meet up with her newly met guy after 1 week of dating each other on Facebook.
data.answer_en_hint: Christina decided to meet up with her newly met guy after 1 week of dating each other on Facebook.

data.trans: Chẳng mất gì (khi làm chuyện gì)
data.trans_hint: Tớ nghĩ cậu nên trả lời tin nhắn của anh ta đi vì làm thế cũng chẳng mất gì cả.
data.en_hint: I think you should reply to his message as there's no harm in doing it.
data.content_game_1: I think you should reply to his message as there's no harm in doing it.
data.answer_en_hint: I think you should reply to his message as there's no harm in doing it.
